article.title: Command Line
article.para: Frhed command line usage is simple: the whole following string following program name is considered to be the name of the file to open.

listitem.simpara: frhed filename.dat opens the file called "filename.dat"
frhed a file-name.dat opens the file called "a file-name.dat"

article.simpara: Frhed resolves link files. If the file to open is a link file Frhed asks if the link file itself or the link target should be opened.
